definition[0]: the limits of what is possible or acceptable
example[0]: The humor in the movie sometimes goes beyond the bounds of good taste.
note[0]: be/go beyond the bounds of credibility/reason/decency etc
example[1]: It was not beyond the bounds of possibility that they could meet again.
note[1]: be within/beyond the bounds of possibility
example[2]: We are here to make sure that the police operate within the bounds of the law.
definition[1]: the edges of a town, city etc
